summary: As World War II is going on in Europe, a conflict arises between the French and the Diola-speaking tribe of Africa, prompting the village women to organize their men to sit beneath a tree to pray.
cast: Andongo Diabon|Robert Fontaine|Michel Renaudeau|Ousmane Camara|Ibou Camara|Alphonse Diatta|Pierre Blanchard|Cherif Tamba|Fode Cambay|Etienne Mane|Joseph Diatta|Dji Niassebaron|Antio Bassene|Mbissine Thérèse Diop
title: Emitaï
